## Introduction

This document lists the R version and package vesions used in the development of
the pfsrsdk package. It is built automatically and reflects the latest
versions used. 

## pfsrsdk Package Information

```{r}
packageDescription("pfsrsdk")
```

## R Environment Information

```{r}
library('knitr')

s<-sessionInfo()
enviro<-as.data.frame(s$R.version)

kable(enviro[,1:5], format = "markdown")
kable(enviro[,6:10], format = "markdown")
kable(enviro[,11:length(enviro)], format = "markdown")
```

## Required Packages

pfsrsdk uses `packrat` for package build and runtime dependency management
(See `README.md` for more information).

```{r}
library('knitr')

d<-packageDescription("pfsrsdk")
imports<-strsplit(d[["Imports"]], "[[:punct:][:space:]]+")[[1]]
importFrame<-data.frame(package = imports)

kable(importFrame, format = "markdown")
```
